Section.Paragraph: Much progress has been made in the provision of reusable data resources for Natural Language Engineering, such as grammars, lexicons, thesauruses. Although a number of projects have addressed the provision of reusable algorithmic resources (or 'tools'), takeup of these resources has been relatively slow.
This paper describes GATE, a General Architecture for Text Engineering, which is a freely-available system designed to help alleviate the problem.
